text:
When the theme for the live "Happy End", was decided... 
That's when I started thinking about it.

Chiyuki-san and Tenka-chan are trying to change...
They're truly envisioning the future...

Until now, I thought I was also... envisioning the
future with them... But, I realized...

The future Kaho imagined, well, it was just
wishing for things to stay the same forever...

But... once I noticed...
I felt like I'd be left behind... And so...

Yes, I'm sure you won't, but...
Amana-chan felt that way.

Uh... You see...! ...Naa-chan, you always...
say it's okay to take a nap, right...?

But... because of that... sometimes...
Tenka, feel like have to... wake up...

So...
I can't quite express it... but...!

I'll be able to wake up properly...!
...Even without trying hard...!

I feel the same as Amana-chan... Sometimes I
get anxious about the future, scared, or troubled...

But I think it's because there are
things we don't want to lose...

Just being relentlessly positive about aiming
for the future isn't always possible...

...I think cherishing the present is just
as important as envisioning the future...

...So, I have a suggestion...!
How about... changing the theme of the unit live...?
